content:
Analytics for HR managers aims to provide an in-depth understanding of the challenges of human resource functions (recruitment, selection, training, development, performance, and compensation) in an organization, Furthermore, this course will also cover how HR managers can use analytics to take better decisions related to HR issues and challenges in the organization. Finally, this course will highlight how an organization can develop an HR analytics unit.

Learning Objectives
To understand the process of various human resources functions in an organization

To Study the various challenges of human resource functions in an organization

To learn the use of various types of analytics in making decisions related to various challenges of human resource

To learn the application of various data visualization and data analysis tools such as SPSS, AMOS, Tableau, Power BI
